#summary How to build jSCEP
#labels Phase-Implementation

jSCEP uses [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven] for software project management.

= Downloading the Source =

{{{
svn checkout http://jscep.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ jscep-read-only
cd jscep-read-only
}}}

= Building the Package =

{{{
# Install dependencies
mvn clean install
# Create the various packages
mvn package
}}}
